programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Man of Ice: Wim Hof's Dark Secret
programme.desc: Wim Hof baffles experts --thriving in freezing cold temperatures and swimming under ice in just shorts. But little did the world know that The Ice Man was harboring a heartbreaking secret that drove him to try & conquer the bitter cold.

programme.title: Alvin Law: Rewrite The Label
programme.desc: Alvin Law was born with arms & given up for adoption at birth due to his disability. Despite everything, Alvin is proof that the word cant shouldnt be in anyones vocabulary and that your label doesnt have to define you.

programme.title: Win Against all Odds
programme.desc: Homesick, bankrupt, and father-less, young Dan Lok was devastated when he arrived home one day to find his mom in tears. His riveting coming-of-age story will inspire you to put your best foot forward every single day.

programme.title: Real Stories With Wim Hof
programme.desc: In this bonus exclusive Goalcast interview, find out what Wim Hofs mother said to him at a very young age that drives every move he makes. Wim Hof is a world record breaker and a global phenomenon. He is famous for his superhuman ability to perform extreme long-distance swimming under freezing water. But the Iceman believes he has a special calling in the world.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina

programme.title: Should You Switch Retirement Contributions to Roth?
programme.desc: "Is it better to save for retirement in traditional 401(k)s and IRAs, or in Roth accounts? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 518 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, what are the rules around contributing to two different types of Roth accounts? If required minimum distributions will be staggered because of a couple s age difference, should they convert their retirement savings to Roth, or leave it alone? But first, Joe and Big Al have a backdoor Roth conversion withdrawal debate to settle."

programme.title: Why Companies NEED People Back In The Office
programme.desc: "According to study after study, working from home leads to more efficient workers, less staff turnover, higher quality work, its cheaper for workers AND its cheaper for the business. Before Covid-19 high tech companies were already experimenting with the advantages of remote work. At the moment this plan could backfire for businesses. Unemployment is still low and its easy for high performing employees to find a new job so managers using this tactic need to be careful or they will be left with nothing but their worst employees An easy way to get rid of staff without the bad publicity is just the first reason. So its time to learn How Money Works to find why you are going to be forced back into the office even if it makes no business sense."

programme.title: Why Do Tech Companies Hire and Fire So Much
programme.desc: "The big tech companies have been on a firing spree in the past six month. Googles parent company Alphabet recently announced that they would be cutting 12,000 jobs globally, Microsoft has already laid off 10,000 workers, and Amazon is getting rid of 18,000 workers the largest job cut in the companys 29-year history. Those are just the companies that are doing well Facebook is laying off 13 of its workforce because their big play on the metaverse has failed to excite investors and then there is twitter which laid off half of its workforce and then hired some of them back and then fired them again. Times are tough for businesses and executives are being pressured by investors to make cuts wherever they can. The easiest and quickest way for businesses to save on expenses is to cut out new projects and lay off the staff working on them. There three reasons that tech companies in particular hire so many people and three reasons why they fire so many people just as quickly. The first reason they had so many employees to begin with is because the largest employers in the tech space have been on a diversification spree. The largest tech companies (with the exception of Amazon which employs a large amount of workers in its distribution centers) can run with much smaller crews than they currently do. Software is highly scalable, a single developer can produce an application that is downloaded by millions of people, which is impossible for any other type of business. Compare a company like Meta to a Company like Walmart and the difference is clear, Walmart has a similar market cap but employs twenty-five times as many staff, mostly in its stores and warehouses across the country. The only other industry that comes close is the pharmaceutical industry with research and development teams that create medicines that can be mass produced once they get through the FDA approval process. However, companies like Microsoft, Meta, Alphabet, Amazon and Apple have all hired a lot of extra staff that they dont need to run their busines

programme.title: "Inflation Protection, Space Investments, and Humor in Finance"
programme.desc: "Financial planner Ric Edelman answers a vital viewer question on how to protect against inflation. Ric also talks with astronaut Dan Barry about ways to invest in the final frontier, and Jean Edelman explains how a little humor can go a long way."

programme.title: "Cash Reserves, Financial Schemes & Windfall Strategies"
programme.desc: Ric discuses cash reserves; financial schemes; unexpected windfalls. Also: negotiation techniques are discussed with lawyer Bob Barnett.

programme.title: Your 11 Step Path to Financial Freedom
programme.desc: "Only about one in ten Americans are living their definition of financial freedom: living debt-free, living comfortably, not having to work, or being rich. Too many of us fall short of financial freedom because of a lack of retirement savings, salary constraints, debt, or unforeseen emergencies. This week, Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA put you on Your 11 Step Path to Financial Freedom. Learn to take inventory, invest in yourself, and sustain your financial dreams and goals."

programme.title: Haven't Yet Saved a Million. Can We Still Retire Early?
"How To Make $279,000,000 By Being A Little Snitch"
programme.desc: "The SEC just paid TWO HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-NINE MILLION DOLLARS to ONE person for their role as a whistle-blower on successfully enforced corporate fraud. Here is how you can do the same thing The two hundred and seventy-nine million dollar award more than doubled the one hundred and fourteen million dollar reward that the SEC issued in October of 2020. In total their whistle blower rewards program has paid out over a billion dollars since it was established in 2010. The best part is because the Dodd-Frank Act protects the confidentiality of whistle-blowers and informants no additional information is known about the people who have received these life changing payouts. The securities and exchange commission actually recognises in their press releases that these payouts have added up to a lot of money that could have been given back to the victims of financial crime. But there is three good reasons that [despite the spiralling costs] the SEC has kept the program and actually doubled down on promoting it with payout leader boards and flashy announcements every time a big payout is made. You get the feeling that if it wasnt for the informant privacy laws they would present a novelty size check in front of the press like the whistle-blowers just won the Powerball. But they cant so if you decide that you like the idea of a completely anonymous multi-million-dollar payday I will also tell you the steps that you need to take to become a successful snitch. The first reason that the SEC has set up this program is that its very hard to collect evidence on the white-collar crime they go after. Insider trading hurts regular investors but if the insiders are careful about their communications channels, they can make it almost impossible to collect evidence even with full time surveillance. The SEC admits that a significant amount of clearly illegal activity goes undetected or unpunished. Independent investigations have estimated that only about 15 of financial crimes are ever detected and even fewer are enforced. Nobody know

Norway HD
programme.desc: Follow the TGR crew as they head north of the Arctic Circle. Doubts of finding good waves remain high after the first day of blown out waves, but forecasts of a swell keep the two motivated.

programme.title: Girdwood HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they head north to Girdwood, Alaska, home to some of the steepest and most exposed descents in North America, if not the world.

programme.title: Snowwater, BC
programme.desc: Join Dash Longe, Dylan Hood, and Peter Olenick as they head from Jackson, Wyoming to Snowwater, British Columbia and arrive to find a skier’s wish list of toys at their disposal: snowcat, snowmobiles and a helicopter.

programme.title: Siyinqaba
programme.desc: Nalle Hukkataival and Jimmy Webb recently traveled to Swaziland in search of new boulders and found an unforgettable country with amazing people and fascinating culture. But finding boulder problems isn’t as easy as it sounds, you might end up walking through fields and forest for hours and find nothing. Or you might find a gem, something that could possibly be THE next hard line, maybe even the African Star…

programme.title: Kwanza
programme.desc: Kwanza – The Drowning Diamond of Angola. When Olympic kayaker Mike Dawson heard rumors a river the size of the Zambezi hidden in West Africa he set in motion an ambitious plan to travel into the heart of Angola on the adventure of a life time to attempt the rivers wild rapids. ‘Kwanza’ is the story of that journey. An odyssey from the highlands of Zambia, through the deserts of Namibia and into the rawness of Angola.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Cooke City HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they head to Cooke City, Montana. Using locals as their guides, the crew finds cliffs to drop and straight-line some chutes while building tow-in booters.

programme.title: You Never Know
programme.desc: This documentary movie tells the story of one of the most successful female paragliding pilots in history. Klaudia shows throughout her career that if you really want something there is no way to stop you to make it happen. Regardless many difficulties she manages to win the World Champion Title in 2013. But she didn’t stop there. Winning medals isn’t the goal but progress, pursuit of personal excellence, sharing joy with friends and motivating others to follow their dreams is.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Weyakin HD
programme.desc: Join a talented and ragtag band of kayakers as they seek out the wildest whitewater in the world.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: The event attracted top international talent to the Algarve circuit, known for its challenging layout and high-speed corners.

programme.title: Classic Details
programme.desc: Today's show looks at a few classic details. Amy Alan has a serger lesson. She reviews the basic serger stitches and teaches when to use them and tension adjustments for each. Then, Angela Wolf introduces princess seams -- why you use them, how to adjust for fit, and then how to sew them. Finally, Kenneth D. King has a couture technique for curved tucks on a fabulous top.

programme.title: Fit and Flare
programme.desc: A classic style sometimes can use a change whether for fashion or fit. Fit expert Kathleen Cheetham teaches how to create a back yoke on a blouse to eliminate multiple darts or change to a more casual look. Then, it's a lesson on sleeves for your Little Black Dress with Angela Wolf. Finally, Gretchen Hirsch alters a favorite pattern by adding a flounce for a fashion flare.

programme.title: Tie It
programme.desc: Tie it all together with a color drop necklace with tied ribbon, a loomed mosaic bracelet using tile beads with Julianna Hudgins and a recycled tie, cuff bracelet featuring crystal with Laura Timmons.

programme.title: Trendspotting: Parachute Cord and Flowers
programme.desc: Using parachute cord in a whole new way, author Ashley Bunting adds beads from her stash to make a charming, colorful floral brooch. Katie rides the floral jewelry wave with pendants made with leather flowers, wire and crystals.

programme.title: Episode 11: Color Explosion
programme.desc: Add new life to the simplest designs. Ashley Horton adds splashes of color to highlight a page. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer explores the meaning of color with stamp rollers and watercolors. Ashley Horton has a tip for hand-stitching on scrapbook pages. Calligrapher Joanne Fink mixes it up with metallic inks.

programme.title: Time to Stop
programme.desc: It's time to make it artsy. Knowing when to stop is as important as starting. There are subtle cues to help you decide when your project is complete. First, we begin with white space. Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer shows you don't have to fill in the whole page when you're stenciling. You can train your eye to leave just the right amount of space. Then it's a faux encaustic technique with Seth Apter. You'll learn when to stop and when to keep going. Finally, Mary Hettmansperger shares design techniques for fabric and fiber.

programme.title: LIFE IS A CARNIVAL
programme.desc: Six Incredible and dynamic actors, that has brought this project cinematographic, into something very unique and original. Even thou each charters has a very wild and unchallenging roles to deal with, their talents was in how they were able to separates the laughters from the cries to then suddenly breath again an atmosphere of full of romance where dreams magically can come true.

programme.title: EXHIBIT X
programme.desc: A party held in one of the most haunted houses in the country as a publicity stunt to launch a new liquor company ended with 51 people dead. The police arrived on the scene to find the house on fire. They managed to rescue one person from the blaze, a beautiful model from New York who is not the prime suspect in the murder trial. A camera containing footage from that night was also found in the house and delivered to investigators. This is the restricted footage leaked by a jury member in one of the most infamous murder trials in US history and the first of its kind of include paranormal evidence.

programme.title: FUNNY LITTLE CARS 1 ADVENTURES IN THE LITTLE OAZA
programme.desc: Citizens of Doom Valley are not human beings but cars, trucks, boats, scooters, and containers with solid human characteristics. Criminals and environmentally unsound businesses are destroying Doom Valley, and its up to the few residents left in town to stay and fight back.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 53
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. programme.desc: Bienvenidos a Risas y más, el programa donde contamos los videos más divertidos de todos los tiempos.

programme.title: BULL-DOZER
programme.desc: It is harvest festival and the backyard of Hotel Kelifornia is transformed into a muddy field.Basha and Sundar are the usual chasing self. The duo soon finds that it is bull racing competition happening in the backyard makeshift field. Basha in all his style is ready to participate. Chai Raja is very excited to see a buzzing crowd around his hotel which means good business. Sundar who get busy with serving and excited about the racing gets a jealous competitive streak when he sees Basha. Sundar sneaks out and is ready to race. The third participant is a lanky frail kid with two thinner bulls. The race is on. And Basha and Sundar soon gets into chasing each other messing each others racing and everything around them. It is a hilarious spectacle for the crowd and a horrifying experience for Chai Raja. And race ends with a thoroughly beaten Basha and Sundar losing to the lanky kid who still cant believe that he won since he and the skinny bulls just walked through the race. The story ends with Chai Raja putting both Sundar and Basha to clean up the whole mess they created.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: LOTTERY
programme.desc: Chai Raja buys a lottery ticket from a ticket seller who passes by. Chai Raja dreams of him in a 7 storeyed teashop, with many Sundars cleaning and serving around. Getting out of his dream, Chai Raja writes down the number on the wall and hands the ticket to Sundar. Sundar, caught up in his chores tucks it away in his tent but forgets about it. Next day Sundar look at the newspaper and is stunned to see that the ticket has won the prize!Sundar searches high and low inside his paraphernalia, watched by Basha till he finally finds it in his tent. Sundar lapses into a day-dream in which he owns the 7 storeyed teashop with Chai Raja at his service and Basha cleaning around. However, Basha pokes his tail popping the dream and dashes off with the ticket. A mad chase, ensues as Sundar tries to get back the ticket. Basha wants the ticket for himself so that his own dream may come true that of being the owner of the 7 storeyed teashop with bananas all around and Chai Raja, his personal chef. (Sundar will be the entertainment). The chase starts now for the ticket. Chai Raja has no clue as to what is happening. As the chase happens, the greedy customers want to get their hands on it as well. The ticket finally falls and there is a pile-up outside the shop as everyone dives for it. Sundar emerges, dishevelled and bruised but holding the ticket- only to have it chewed by a nanny goat! By then Chai Raja arrives at the scene realizing what just happened.

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: CHAI MEIN HAADI
programme.desc: Sundar during his break time eagerly goes outside, digs up a bone which he has stored there, kisses it and happily brings it to his tent inside the hotel. He is about to lick it when an angry Chai Raja snatches it and throws it away warning Sundar never to touch it. Though utterly disappointed, the obedient Sundar decides to forget about the bone. But the naughty Basha who sees this charade has no plans of leaving it. What follows is an endless chain of event when the bone pops up all over the teashop in the customers vada, in Chai Rajas tea tumbler, on the kitchen counter, on Chai Rajas head and in Sundars mouth. And poor Sundar is getting it hard from Chai Raja. The entire episode is about Sundar trying everything possible to get the god-forsaken bone out of the tea shop. But it backfires every single time!

programme.title: Aprils Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: Let Me Fly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: CRUNCHY SHAADI
programme.desc: A newly married couple straight from the mandap is passing by Hotel Kelifornia when the bride still in the wedding dress (with ghoonghat) smells the yummy fried murukku and the piping hot tea. She wants to try and her young and chivalrous husband would give his beautiful wife anything she wants. The couple comes in and the husband is all grandiose personified to impress his wife. Sundar is all ready to please them. And our little Basha finds this the right opportunity to grab the crispy murukkus. He makes sure that none of the food which Sundar carries, goes to the couple. And Basha comes up with crazy ways including disguising as the groom (with sehera) to grab and eat the food from the brides plate before she could even smell them. The bride is angered by the groom who is incapable of feeding her. The poor groom is trying everything possible to win the heart of his young wife. It is madness inside the hotel and Sundar is going nuts. At last the bride is fed up. She whacks the hell out of the useless groom. Basha now changes his plan and does things in such a way that the groom thinks that Sundar has been messing with him. The groom is furious and exposes Sundar to his bride and then throws him away. Then the chivalrous groom takes a huge plate full of snacks and offers it to his wife. Awww it is love all over again!! And the couple walk away in full on romance. With a crying Sundar looking at them. Basha is chewing the fag end of the yummy kacha-kela-bhajiya!

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Colonel Nutbuster & the Candy Cane Ballerinas
programme.desc: It is indeed a silent night at the library on this Christmas Eve. The Creepy Candy are relaxing in the branches of the Christmas tree watching the snow fall outside as they wonder about the magic of Santa Clause.I am Colonel Harvey Nutbuster. My very own grandfather served with Santa during the Toy Wars. Like brothers they were! I know all about Santa!Harvey Nutbuster unlocks a book that is standing on the mantel and he clips the key to his belt and pushes the book open. The Candies strain to see inside.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: COMPETITION!
programme.desc: A travelling carnival team puts up a show in front of Hotel Kelifornia. They are organizing a competition for the villagers. Climbing up the Greasy Pole. At the top is placed the trophy. Chai Raja is happy to have a crowd and good business. Sundar is happily serving tea outside when he suddenly sees the game. He is transfixed by it and wants to participate. Next we see a heated competition in which Basha, some kids, men, Sundar etc trying funnily to climb. At last it is Sundar and Basha who are left for the finals. Now they dont want each other to win. It is a maddening mayhem when Basha and Sundar play nasty tricks, traps and contraptions to make each others climb a disaster. Lets see who wins! Or will Chai Raja find out that his waiter is playing with the customers outside?! Oh my!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Gummy’s Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Little big lizard
programme.desc: The twins help a tiny lizard who everyone was ignoring, find a princesss ring and save the day.

programme.title: Treasured friends
programme.desc: Ragoo brings a treasure map and the twins find themselves on a desert island were they meet a Pirate with a problem.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Not like us
programme.desc: The twins help a little frog who is discriminated against because of her colour.

programme.title: King couch potato
programme.desc: The twins travel to a medieval castle where they meet a king who is too comfortable and lazy to ever leave home.

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: Thunderstorm
programme.desc: The twins help a girl to overcome her fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Dunky's Day in
programme.desc: Dunky has high fever and cannot tolerate any kind of noise. Cat has not had lunch as Dunky is sick… Keet fools him a lot by offering empty glasses for water..

programme.title: I Cant Fall A sleep
programme.desc: Duda is hanging his Smoofy blanket to dry. Its been his good friend since he was a baby and he needs it to sleep every night. A strong wind blows Smoofy to Scots hideout and Scot decides to turn him into his cape. When Duda realizes that his Smoofy is gone, he becomes distraught and cannot fall asleep. The friends go butterfly exploring the next day; However, Dudas exhaustion from a restless night ruins his expedition. After discovering Dudas problem, the friends try to help him fall asleep. Soon, Scot shows up with a sleep-inducing invention, and inadvertently reunites Doubt with his precious Smoofy. But Scot wont give up Smoofy without a fight.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: Weather Boy
programme.desc: Rain keeps Fred and his buddies stuck inside, until Friday secretly clears the rain clouds, earning Fred the name, “Weather boy.” Brains warns Fred never to try that again, though Nora begs him to make her beach party have a sunny day. Fred’s tinkering attracts a strange gas cloud, which they must freeze, causing snow on the beach.

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the "Sneezils flu," all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Too Many Bubbles
programme.desc: When Pancake eats too many bubbles from the Bubble Pond, he becomes super bouncy. Too much of anything isnt good.

programme.title: A “Bumpy” Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Seducción Prohibida
programme.desc: Al mudarse con su familia a Francia, Simone inicia un romance con un joven obrero que desestabiliza su vida.

programme.title: Amor en el rancho
programme.desc: Una entrevista lleva a la reportera Allison a un hermoso rancho, donde conoce a Hank y a su encantadora abuela.

programme.title: Amor y fiebre en Ibiza
programme.desc: En Ibiza, donde la edad es solo un número, cuatro parejas se enredan en romances y desventuras.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: tulips shall grow madcap models no. u1-5-1942
Robinhood Makes Good 1939
programme.desc: Three little squirrels act out the story of Robin Hood. A fox, thinking he can make a meal out of them, joins in. The squirrels have to find a way to get rid of the fox.

programme.title: Leprechauns Gold 1949
programme.desc: A song-filled Noveltoon featuring the antics of the Irish Leprechauns during their annual gold-washing ceremony. It depicts the wee people of Ireland who flavor its traditions with laughs and legend.

programme.title: Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: Campus Capers 1949
programme.desc: This one features a cat-versus-mouse football game between two cat-and-mouse colleges, called Harbard and Quinceton, and there is nothing Ivy-League about either school. The highlights are a screwy college fight-song and a statute-of-liberty misdirection football play in which the Statute of Liberty participates.

programme.title: The Arctic Giant- 1942
programme.desc: Superman versus a thawed-out Tyrannosaurus.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and the Indians-1935
programme.desc: A Native American hunter tries to hunt two ducks. A cow saves them, so the hunter goes after the cow

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: A Car-Tune Portrait 1937
programme.desc: A symphony composer lion is determined to show the audience that cartoon characters can be more than just silly and childish by having cartoons play a symphony orchestra. Things quickly fall apart as the true nature of cartoons comes out anyways

programme.title: Betty Boop- Buzzy Boop 1938
programme.desc: Betty's young cousin, Buzzy, takes the train to visit Betty. On the train, she's helpful, in a bratty kind of way, using her chewing gum to stick on a sleeping man's toupee, watering the flowers in a lady's hat, etc. At Betty's house, she sees the boys next door playing marbles and tries to join in; she proves better at things like walking on a fence than the boys, and even fares well with the goat the boys unleash

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939
programme.desc: Betty Boop and Pudgy, doing the spring planting, are plagued by crows.

programme.title: Half Shot at Sunrise1930
programme.desc: The stage stars Wheeler and Woolsey play two soldiers who go absent without leave in Paris, during World War I.

programme.title: Yes, Yes, Nanette 1925
programme.desc: Nanette sends a letter to her family telling of her new husband, Hillory. When Hillory arrives to meet the family, he gets insulted by each member, including the dog, and loses his wig. After having dinner with the family, Nanette's former lover returns, and Hillory must confront him.

programme.title: No Noise-1923
programme.desc: The gang pays Mickey a visit at the hospital. They switch vaccination orders with another group of kids, but the staff catches on and gives them false diseases to worry about.

programme.title: The Lucy Show 1966: Season 5; Episode 8; Lucy and Carol in Palm Springs
programme.desc: Lucy calls in sick so she can join her roommate at a Palm Springs resort. Unfortunately, her boss, Mr. Mooney, is staying at the same hotel.

programme.desc: On a winter day, when a tiger escapes from the zoo, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's house. Having no place to go, he wanders from here to there while working as a substitute driver and meets his old girlfriend.

programme.title: The Policeman's Lineage
programme.desc: Major Crimes captain Park Kang-yoon receives special funding to carry out his investigations and lives the life of luxury with fancy sedan, high-end condo, designer suits and accessories. A rookie named Min-jae joins his unit, who happens to be very by the book. The pair becomes close as they begin investigating a new type of street drug, but Kang-yoon finds out that there is a mole within his unit, who has been compiling a case against him. As Min-jae is shown into the shady world of slush funds being used on cops, he is exposed to a secret organization within the ranks...

programme.title: Cutting Room
programme.desc: In “Cutting Room,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that our situation might be bigger than us, but it’s not bigger than our God.

programme.title: Now What?
programme.desc: In “Now What?,” Pastor Holly Furtick explains that the outcome of your story is determined by how you respond to the problem — so stay present and see what God does next.

programme.title: OFF MENU
programme.desc: In “OFF MENU,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though we might not feel ready for this season of our lives, God has already prepared us for the exact assignment that we are designed to accomplish.

programme.title: Concealed But Not Canceled
programme.desc: As we celebrate our 18-year anniversary, Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us in “Concealed But Not Canceled” that God can turn our greatest weakness into His greatest weapon.

programme.title: Rags To Righteous
programme.desc: There’s more God wants to do through you. In “Rags to Righteous!” Pastor Steven Furtick explains that God has a plan for every pit stop on the way to your purpose.
